name: Warface: Global Operations – FPS Action Shooter
name_original: Warface: Global Operations – FPS Action Shooter
description:
• Join in the adrenaline-pumping action combat. Enjoy team-based gameplay on perfectly balanced maps. The definitive multiplayer experience returns, bigger and better than ever
• Quickly master the intuitive controls. Simple navigation and controls will help you understand the main features and mechanics with ease and immerse yourself in the game more fully
• Tons of fully customizable weapons. Assault rifles, shotguns, SMGs and sniper rifles — assemble the gun of your dreams with loads of attachments. Upgrade your weapon and conquer leaderboards
• Live in the stunningly detailed and realistic combat scenes. The amazing quality of the graphics, with an emphasis on realism, raises the bar for shooters
• Create your own unique character appearance. Equip your character with different items to stand out among the millions of players
• If you have a problem with this game, please contact us at: warfacego@corp.my.com
